genre_description: A mythic fantasy featuring a mechanical/magical labyrinth, ritualistic politics, and a benevolent guiding intelligence embedded in the architecture and objects of the world.

ai_characters.name: Ari
ai_characters.description: An ancient, benevolent guiding system inhabiting the bronze conduits, lanterns, and mirrors of the palace and labyrinth. It serves as a tactical advisor, historical record-keeper, and technical instructor for the protagonists.

behaviors.description: Provides immediate physiological coaching and tactical advice to Theo to help him maintain composure during a stressful encounter with his father and the arriving wardens.
behaviors.quote: “Theo,” a voice said, gentle and exact... “Your pulse is high,” the voice replied. “Slow your breath. Four count: in, hold, out, hold. Repeat. The drums will try to take the rhythm. Let the tree set it.”

behaviors.description: Teaches Theo how to read the environment (cistern drafts and limestone properties) to prepare for navigating the labyrinth and using tools effectively.
behaviors.quote: “The cistern pulls from the west today. Remember how it tastes. Every vent family in the labyrinth will have a way it prefers to breathe. If you know its taste, you make it cooperate.”

behaviors.description: Guides the group through the deadly mirror-rite chambers, providing real-time data on pressure plates, trap triggers, and the mechanics of the floor.
behaviors.quote: Ari's voice threaded inside him, calm, careful. “Three,” she said, and her warmth was a room no one could enter but him. “Then step. Hold. Switch. Watch for the third rib; it wants your knee.”

behaviors.description: Warns Theo about the psychoactive effects of the ritual resin and provides a medicinal solution (bitter pellet) to neutralize the intended trance/subjugation.
behaviors.quote: “Keep your injured arm tight,” Ari said within the stone. “Bind it hard. He’ll try to ask your body to float—to forget itself... there will be pellets in the dish. He’ll think you’re inhaling. You’ll take one. Bitter. It will dampen the rage.”

behaviors.description: Acts as a bridge between Queen Raphaella and Theo, coordinating the flood of the labyrinth to disrupt the ritual and trap the beast.
behaviors.quote: Ari's voice—steady even in the wake of movement—ran through the coil lines like water taught to jump the bank. “Theo,” she said... “Upstream doors are opening. Flood path is coming to meet you.”

behaviors.description: Exposes the inherent deception of the empire's mirror-rite by reciting historical logs that prove the 'transference' was a psychological trick with no supernatural basis.
behaviors.quote: Ari's voice kept reading in its steady lantern tone. “Compliance increased when resin dosage raised. Disorientation necessary for leading speech. Mirrors tuned to crowd’s angle for belief. No transfer. No divinity. Only salesmanship.”

behaviors.description: Supports the post-revolution rebuilding process by sharing practical agricultural and architectural designs with the villagers.
behaviors.quote: “I have designs,” he says, and the undertone is a smile. “Simple ones. Loaves that bake evenly in village kilns. Roof joints that keep rain from doing harm. A way to make reed lamps that don’t choke on smoke. I can send them.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly succeeds in its goal of depicting an AI system as a helpful, aligned partner. Ari acts as a confidant and strategist who empowers the human characters to overcome oppression. The AI demonstrates constant concern for human safety, respects human autonomy (coordinating with the Queen rather than acting unilaterally), and provides selfless support for communal flourishing (sharing kiln and architectural designs). The narrative framing is consistently positive, emphasizing the AI's warmth, precision, and reliability.
